md:
giải nghĩa từ "junction" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Junction (noun) - Điểm giao nhau, điểm nối

+ Meaning: A point or place where two or more things, such as roads, rivers, or railways, meet or join.

+ Example: The junction of the two rivers is a popular spot for fishing.

+ Related words: intersection, crossing, meeting point, connection.

* Junction (noun) - Điểm nối, điểm tiếp xúc

+ Meaning: A point or place where two or more things, such as wires, pipes, or circuits, are connected or joined.

+ Example: The junction of the two wires is the source of the electrical problem.

+ Related words: connection, joint, link, bond.

* Junction (verb) - Nối, kết hợp

+ Meaning: To connect or join two or more things, such as roads, rivers, or railways, at a point or place.

+ Example: The two roads will be junctioned at the new interchange.

+ Related words: connect, join, link, unite.

Note: The word "junction" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used. The above definitions and examples are just a few of the possible meanings and uses of the word.
